title: Agnes

|   | This spriggan is aged and weathered from years of travel away from the forests and swamps that are home to her kin. Her choice of weapon and astonishing speed both speak to the training she underwent. Underestimate her at your peril! |

## Useful Info

**Agnes the Wanderer** is a very fast [spriggan](/Spriggan_\(monster\) "Spriggan (monster)") warrior who wields a [lajatang](/Lajatang "Lajatang") (often [branded](/Brand "Brand")). She attacks almost twice as fast as normal and is capable of dealing heavy damage very quickly, especially with a good brand.

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):14-15
- The [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls"): 1-2
- [The Snake Pit](/The_Snake_Pit "The Snake Pit")
- [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest")

## Tips & Tricks

- While heavily armored fights can usually plow right through her, other characters will want to watch out. Try to beat her at range, if at all possible.
- Her [evasion](/Ev "Ev") makes hitting her in general tricky. If possible, try to hit her with unavoidable spells like [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike"), [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), or [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction"). [Clouds](/Cloud "Cloud"), such as from a [scroll of poison](/Scroll_of_poison "Scroll of poison"), [condenser vane](/Condenser_vane "Condenser vane"), or [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud"), are very effective. You can also use evocables like the [wand of roots](/Wand_of_roots "Wand of roots") (which lowers her EV), [wand of iceblast](/Wand_of_iceblast "Wand of iceblast"), or [lightning rod](/Lightning_rod "Lightning rod").
- While [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") can't miss, Agnes has high [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"). A [scroll of vulnerability](/Scroll_of_vulnerability "Scroll of vulnerability") can bring it down to manageable levels.

Agnes

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all spriggans, see list of spriggans.

Agnes i 
HP 65-132
HD 11
XP 2135
Speed 18
AC 2
EV 20
Will 100
Attack1 30 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Little
Type spriggan, spriggan
Flags Fighter
See invisible
Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Female
This spriggan is aged and weathered from years of travel away from the forests and swamps that are home to her kin. Her choice of weapon and astonishing speed both speak to the training she underwent. Underestimate her at your peril!

Useful Info

Agnes the Wanderer is a very fast spriggan warrior who wields a lajatang (often branded). She attacks almost twice as fast as normal and is capable of dealing heavy damage very quickly, especially with a good brand.

Location

  • The Dungeon:14-15
  • The Elven Halls: 1-2
  • The Snake Pit
  • Spider's Nest

Tips & Tricks

  • While heavily armored fights can usually plow right through her, other characters will want to watch out. Try to beat her at range, if at all possible.
  • Her evasion makes hitting her in general tricky. If possible, try to hit her with unavoidable spells like Airstrike, Fireball, or Lee's Rapid Deconstruction. Clouds, such as from a scroll of poison, condenser vane, or Freezing Cloud, are very effective. You can also use evocables like the wand of roots (which lowers her EV), wand of iceblast, or lightning rod.
  • While Hexes can't miss, Agnes has high willpower. A scroll of vulnerability can bring it down to manageable levels.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Agnes&oldid=68812"

==Useful Info==
'''Agnes the Wanderer''' is a very fast [[spriggan (monster)|spriggan]] warrior who wields a [[lajatang]] (often [[brand]]ed). She attacks almost twice as fast as normal and is capable of dealing heavy damage very quickly, especially with a good brand.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:14-15
*The [[Elven Halls]]: 1-2
*[[The Snake Pit]]
*[[Spider's Nest]]

==Tips & Tricks==
* While heavily armored fights can usually plow right through her, other characters will want to watch out. Try to beat her at range, if at all possible.
* Her [[ev]]asion makes hitting her in general tricky. If possible, try to hit her with unavoidable spells like [[Airstrike]], [[Fireball]], or [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]]. [[Cloud]]s, such as from a [[scroll of poison]], [[condenser vane]], or [[Freezing Cloud]], are very effective. You can also use evocables like the [[wand of roots]] (which lowers her EV), [[wand of iceblast]], or [[lightning rod]].
* While [[Hexes]] can't miss, Agnes has high [[willpower]]. A [[scroll of vulnerability]] can bring it down to manageable levels.

[[Category:Spriggan]]
